SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AbstractDAO<T>
A generic Data Access Object (DAO) base class that provides common CRUD operations for any domain entity T, using reflection and introspection to map fields to table columns.
Bill
Represents a Bill in the `log` table of the database, with a unique identifier, identifier of the corresponding order, the name of the client, the name of the product, the ordered quantity and the total price of the order.
BillBLL
Business‐logic layer for Bill records.
BillDAO
DAO (Data Access Object) for Bill records.
Client
Represents a client in the database, with a unique identifier, a name, an address, and an email.
ClientBLL
Business‐logic layer for Client entities.
ClientDAO
DAO (Data Access Object) for Client entities.
ClientView
Swing GUI window for managing clients.
ConnectionFactory
Singleton class for database connection.
Controller
Central GUI controller that mediates between Swing views and the business-logic layer (ClientBLL, ProductBLL, OrderBLL, BillBLL).
EditClientView
Swing GUI window for editing an existing client’s details.
EditProductView
Swing GUI window for editing an existing product’s details.
IncorrectAddressException
Thrown to indicate that a provided address value is invalid.
IncorrectClientNameException
Thrown to indicate that a provided client name is invalid.
IncorrectEmailException
Thrown to indicate that a provided email address is invalid.
IncorrectProductNameException
Thrown to indicate that a provided product name is invalid.
IncorrectProductPriceException
Thrown to indicate that a provided product price is invalid.
IncorrectProductQuantityException
Thrown to indicate that a provided product quantity is invalid.
Main
 
MainView
The main application window providing navigation to all sub‐views.
Order
Represents an order in the database, with a unique identifier, the name of the client, the name of the product, and the quantity of the ordered product.
OrderBLL
Business‐logic layer for Order entities.
OrderDAO
DAO (Data Access Object) for Order entities.
OrderView
Swing GUI window for creating and viewing orders.
Product
Represents a product in inventory, with a unique identifier, a name, a price, and a stock quantity.
ProductBLL
Business-Logic Layer for Product entities.
ProductDAO
DAO (Data Access Object) for Product entities.
ProductView
Swing GUI window for managing products.
TablePopulator
A utility interface for populating a JTable from a list of Java objects or records.
ViewAllTable
A scrollable window for displaying any list of items in a JTable.
